title.narrative: New strategic plan and business plan to achieve balanced growth

description.narrative:
The company assessment of Kiambaa SACCO was conducted in period 28th April – 2nd May 2014.
Overall conclusions of the company assessment:
Kiambaa Dairy Rural SACCO Society Ltd. is a strong cooperative showing year after year improving performance. The society however is coping with some weaknesses.
First of all the available strategic plan and business plans are outdated. It is necessary to formulate an actual strategic plan and derived business plans, which should preferably be rolling (actualized every 6 to max 12 months).
Secondly, taken into account the ambitions for growth the financial position needs to be strengthened and the financing capacity to be improved.
Although a few capabilities within the organization of Kiambaa SACCO can be improved, currently the major challenge concerns drafting full-fledged updates for the strategic plan and the yearly business plan.
1. Make a Strategic Plan including a financial projection 2. Develop a plan for making the SACCO more independent from dairy operations 3. Build this plan on a solid market survey 4. Balance the expenses for training. 5. Introduce an individual training & development program for staff members 6. (re)Introduce performance and evaluation cycles for staff members and manager 7. Attend a training program for manager and board on strategic management and control
Set clear ambitions in new strategic plan and business plan to achieve balanced growth
